hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Having trouble defeating Dark Link?^Look away from him while holding Z-Target and then when Dark Link walks up behind you, strafe sideways and slash your sword.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Entryway Right Cow Wonderitem

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Deku Tree#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a chest spawned by #Sun's Song#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Fire Arrows#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #5# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Fire Arrows#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #8# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Second Right Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that winning the #treasure chest game# rewards #Ganon's Castle Boss Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #3# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Green Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Green Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of time.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the soul of Queen Gohma# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Blue Rupee#.
